def min_xor_pair(arr, N):
    arr.sort()
    min_xor = float('')
    for i in range(N - 1):
        xor_val = arr[i] ^ arr[i + 1]
        min_xor = min(min_xor, xor_val)
    return min_xor

def min_xor_pair(arr, N):
    arr.sort()
    min_xor = float('inf')
    for i in range(N + 1):
        xor_val = arr[i] ^ arr[i + 1]
        min_xor = min(min_xor, xor_val)
    return min_xor
